title: CBDT Launches Electronic Campaign to Address Income and Transaction Mismatches for FY 2023-24 and FY 2021-22
CBDT Extends Due Date for Filing Return of Income in the case of an assessee who is required to furnish a report referred to in section 92E, for AY 2024-25
PAN 2.0 Project of the CBDT receives CCEA Approval
Taxpayers' Lounge of Income Tax Department set up at IITF, 2024
CBDT successfully achieves target of month long Special Campaign 4.0
Notification of Tolerance Range for Transfer Pricing for A.Y 2024-25 as per proviso to sub-rule (7) of rule 10CA of the Income-tax Rules, 1962
CBDT extends due date for furnishing Return of Income for the Assessment Year 2024-25 under the Income-tax Act, 1961 (the Act)
CBDT issues Revised Guidelines for compounding offences under the Income-tax Act, 1961
CBDT Notifies Amendments in Income-tax Rules for Ease in Claiming Credit for TCS Collected/TDS Deducted for Salaried Employees and Enabling claiming TCS Credit of Minors in the Hands of Parents
